name: Bulma
description: Bulma is a modern & responsive framework

category.Helpers: Apply helper components, in order to alter their style
category.Columns: The power of Flexbox in a simple interface
category.Layout: Design the structure of your webpage with these components
category.Form: The indispensable form components, designed for maximum clarity
category.Components: Advanced multi-part components with lots of possibilities

icon.name: The icon to use.
icon.side: Which side the icon belongs on.
icon.rotate: How the icon should be rotated.
icon.flip: How the icon should be flipped.
icon.square: If the icon is a square

image.squareSize: If the image is a square, and what size.

base-event.stop: If the event should stop other components from receiving the event.
base-event.prevent: If the event should stop the default behavior of the browser.

value-event.stop: If the event should stop other components from receiving the event.
value-event.prevent: If the event should stop the default behavior of the browser.

select-event.stop: If the event should stop other components from receiving the event.
select-event.prevent: If the event should stop the default behavior of the browser.
select-event.values: The new values, if multiple can be selected.
select-event.options: The options selected, if multiple can be selected.

dropdown-item.text: The text to display in the dropdown item.
dropdown-item.html: HTML to display in the dropdwn item.
dropdown-item.href: The URL to go to if the dropdown item is chosen.
dropdown-item.divider: If this dropdown item is just a divider.
dropdown-item.active: If the dropdown item should be displayed as active.
dropdown-item.leftIcon: An icon to display on the left side of the dropdown item.
dropdown-item.rightIcon: An icon to display on the right side of the dropdown item.

link-options.href: URL of the page the link goes to.
link-options.tab: If the URL should open in a new tab.
link-options.download: If the target should be downloaded when clicked.
link-options.external: If the URL could be external and should be blocked from accessing data on this page.

crumb-scope.crumbIndex: The index of the current crumb

field-state.size: The size of the components in the field.

bulma/column.label: Column
bulma/column.description: A column that goes in a Columns container.

width.label: Width
width.description: The width in the column in a 12 column layout.
width.default: Equal width to other widthless columns

offset.label: Offset
offset.description: The offset of the column in a 12 column layout.

narrow.label: Is Narrow
narrow.description: The column will only take up the space it needs.

narrowBreakpoint.label: Narrow Breakpoint
narrowBreakpoint.description: The breakpoint for when the column is narrow or not.

default.label: Content
default.description: The components that go in the column.

gap.label: Gap
gap.description: The size of the gap between columns.

multiline.label: Wrap?
multiline.description: If columns should wrap if they go beyond 12 columns wide.

verticalCenter.label: Center Vertically
verticalCenter.description: If the columns should be vertically aligned in the row.

mobile.label: Columns on Mobile
mobile.description: If columns should work on mobile too, as opposed to wrapping the columns.

default.label: Columns
default.description: The columns in this column container.

bulma/breadcrumb.label: Breadcrumb
bulma/breadcrumb.description: A simple breadcrumb component to improve your navigation experience.

getIcon.label: Crumb Icon
getIcon.description: Gets an icon from a crumb to display, if any.

getOptions.label: Crumb Options
getOptions.description: Gets link options for a crumb.

separator.label: Separator
separator.description: The visual to use to separate crumbs.

align.label: Alignment
align.description: How the crumbs are aligned horizontally.

click.label: On Click
click.description: An event triggered when a user clicks on a crumb.

default.label: Crumb Text
default.description: The content to place for a crumb.

bulma/card.label: Card
bulma/card.description: An all-around flexible and composable component.

headerIcon.label: Header Icon
headerIcon.description: The icon to display in the header.

headerIconHref.label: Header Icon URL
headerIconHref.description: The URL to go to if the user clicks on the Header Icon

footerLinks.label: Footer Links
footerLinks.description: If the items in the footer are clickable links/buttons.

image.label: Image
image.description: The image to display at the top of the card.

headerIconClick.label: On Header Icon Click
headerIconClick.description: An event triggered when the user clicks on the header icon.

footerItemClick.label: On Footer Item Click
footerItemClick.description: An event triggered when the user clicks on a footer item.

header.label: Header
header.description: The components to place in the header of the card.

default.label: Body
default.description: The components to place in the body of the card.

image.label: Image
image.description: The image to place in the card.

footerItems.label: Footer Item
footerItems.description: A collectionof footer items in the footer of the card.

bulma/dropdown.label: Dropdown
bulma/dropdown.description: An interactive dropdown menu for discoverable content.

triggerMode.label: Trigger
triggerMode.description: What triggers how the dropdown opens & closes.

icon.label: Icon
icon.description: An icon to use in the dropdown.

open.label: Open
open.description: Controls when the dropdown is open.

fullWidth.label: Full Width
fullWidth.description: If the dropdown should be as wide as possible.

dropUp.label: Up
dropUp.description: If the dropdown menu should display above the dropdown.

rightAligned.label: Right Aligned
rightAligned.description: If the dropdown menu should align to the right side.

items.label: Items
items.description: The dropdown items to display, assuming the Items slot is not specified.

open.label: On Open
open.description: An event triggered when the dropdown is opened.

close.label: On Close
close.description: An event triggered when the dropdown is closed.

itemClick.label: On Item Click
itemClick.description: An event triggered when the dropdown is closed.

scope.stop: If the event should stop other components from receiving the event.
scope.prevent: If the event should stop the default behavior of the browser.

trigger.label: Trigger
trigger.description: The components which trigger the dropdown to open.

scope.text: The text passed to the dropdown.

default.label: Items
default.description: The components to place in the dropdown menu.

bulma/menu.label: Menu
bulma/menu.description: A simple menu, for any type of vertical navigation.

value.label: Current
value.description: The current value that determines which menu item is displayed as active.

menu.label: Menu
menu.description: The groups of items to display in the menu.

getItems.label: Get Items
getItems.description: Gets items from a Menu Group

callable.menuGroup: The menu group to get a label from.

getLabel.label: Get Menu Group Label
getLabel.description: Gets the label from a Menu Group

callable.menuGroup: The menu group to get a label from.

getSubItems.label: Get Item Sub-items
getSubItems.description: Gets sub-items from a Menu Group Item

callable.item: The menu item to get sub-items from.

getItemText.label: Get Item Text
getItemText.description: Gets the text from a Menu Item

callable.item: The menu item to get the text from.

getItemValue.label: Get Item Value
getItemValue.description: Gets the value from a Menu Item

callable.item: The menu item to get the value from.

getSubItemText.label: Get Sub-item Text
getSubItemText.description: Gets the text from a Menu Sub-item

callable.subItem: The sub-item to get the text from.

getSubItemValue.label: Get Sub-item Value
getSubItemValue.description: Gets the value from a Menu Sub-item

callable.subItem: The sub-item to get the value from.

update.label: On Item Click
update.description: An event triggered when a menu item is clicked.

menuLabel.label: Menu Group Label
menuLabel.description: The components which display a label for a menu group.
menuLabel.default: The text returned by Get Menu Group Label

scope.menuGroup: The Menu Group to display a label for.

menuItem.label: Menu Item
menuItem.description: The components which display a label for a menu item.
menuItem.default: The text returned by Get Item Text

menuSubItem.label: Menu Sub-item
menuSubItem.description: The components which display a label for a menu sub-item.
menuSubItem.default: The text returned by Get Sub-item Text

bulma/message.label: Message
bulma/message.description: Colored message blocks, to emphasize part of your page.

header.label: Header
header.description: The header text of the message.

deletable.label: Can Delete?
deletable.description: If the message has a delete button in the top right.

deleted.label: On Delete
deleted.description: An event triggered when the delete is clicked.

default.label: Message
default.description: The components to display in the message.

bulma/modal.label: Modal
bulma/modal.description: A classic modal overlay, in which you can include any content you want.

open.label: Open
open.description: If the modal should be open.

hideClose.label: Hide Close Button?
hideClose.description: If the modal has a delete button in the top right.

closeSize.label: Size
closeSize.description: The size of the close button.

closeOnBackdrop.label: Close on Backdrop Click
closeOnBackdrop.description: If the modal should trigger the close event if the backdrop is clicked.

clipped.label: Clipped
clipped.description: If the content in the modal is clipped.

card.label: Card
card.description: If the modal is a card with a header, body, and footer.

title.label: Card Title
title.description: The title of the card modal.

close.label: On Close
close.description: An event triggered when the close button is clicked.

backdrop.label: On Backdrop Click
backdrop.description: An event triggered when the backdrop is clicked.

title.label: Title
title.default: The title passed to the modal component.

scope.title: The title passed to the modal component.

bulma/navbar.label: Navbar
bulma/navbar.description: A responsive horizontal navbar that can support images, links, buttons, and dropdowns.

fixed.label: Fixed To
fixed.description: Where the navbar is fixed to, if any.

transparent.label: Transparent
transparent.description: Seamlessly integrate the navbar in any visual context.

extraSpace.label: Extra Space?
extraSpace.description: Adds extra space to the navbar.

main.label: Main Navigation?
main.description: If the navbar is the main navigation bar.

left.label: Left
left.description: The navbar items that go on the left and are moved to a dropdown menu for small screens.

right.label: Right
right.description: The navbar items that go on the right and are moved to a dropdown menu for small screens.

brand.label: Brand
brand.description: The navbar items that go on the left and are always visible.

close.label: On Close
close.description: An event triggered when the close button is clicked.

backdrop.label: On Backdrop Click
backdrop.description: An event triggered when the backdrop is clicked.

tab.label: Tab?
tab.description: If the navbar item should look like a tab.

active.label: Active?
active.description: If the navbar item should be marked as the active one.

click.label: On Click
click.description: An event triggered when a navbar item is clicked.

default.label: Content
default.description: The content of the navbar item.

options.label: Link Options
options.description: The options for the target of the link.

tab.label: Tab?
tab.description: If the navbar link should look like a tab.

active.label: Active?
active.description: If the navbar link should be marked as the active one.

click.label: On Click
click.description: An event triggered when a navbar link is clicked.

default.label: Content
default.description: The content of the navbar link.

scope.text: The text passed to the navbar link.

bulma/field.label: Field
bulma/field.description: A container for controls or horizontal fields.

label.label: Label
label.description: The text to display as the label.

message.label: Message
message.description: The message to display at the bottom of the field.

grouped.label: Group Controls
grouped.description: If the multiple controls should be grouped loosely together.

groupedAlign.label: Group Control Alignment
groupedAlign.description: How the grouped controls should be horizontally aligned.

groupedWrap.label: Group Control Wrapping
groupedWrap.description: If the grouped controls should wrap to multiple rows.

horizontal.label: Horizontal
horizontal.description: If the field should display horizontally, with the label on the left instead of above the controls.

status.label: Status
status.description: The status of message, and the status passed down to the controls.

size.label: Size
size.description: The size to pass down to the controls.

horizontalLabelAlignment.label: Horizontal Label Alignment
horizontalLabelAlignment.description: The size of the controls on the right which is used to align the label for a horizontal field.

label.label: Label
label.description: The content to put in the field label.
label.default: The Label passed to the field.

scope.label: The Label passed to the field.

scope.fieldState: A state to pass down to the controls.

message.label: Message
message.description: The message to display in the field.
message.default: The Message passed to the field.

scope.message: The Message passed to the field.

fieldState.label: Field State
fieldState.description: If this icon is in a Field, this is the Field State passed from the Field.

bulma/control.label: Control
bulma/control.description: A container for inputs, buttons, and icons for a form.

leftIcon.label: Left Icon
leftIcon.description: The icon to place on the left side of the control.

rightIcon.label: Right Icon
rightIcon.description: The icon to place on the right side of the control.

fieldState.label: Field State
fieldState.description: The state of the parent field.
fieldState.default: The Field State from the parent Field.

expanded.label: Expand
expanded.description: Expands the control to take up all available space.

loading.label: Loading
loading.description: If the control should indicate a loading status.

default.label: Inputs
default.description: The inputs, buttons, or icons to display in the Control.

scope.fieldState: The Field State passed down from the Field.

bulma/input.label: Input
bulma/input.description: The text input and its variations.

placeholder.label: Placeholder
placeholder.description: A placeholder to display in an empty input.

autocomplete.label: Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: If & how the input should autocomplete values.

rounded.label: Rounded
rounded.description: If the input should have rounded corners.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: If the input should be disabled.

readonly.label: Read Only
readonly.description: If the input should be readonly,

updateOn.label: Update On
updateOn.description: Which input event should trigger an update event.

input.label: On Input
input.description: An event triggered when the user changes the text input value.

change.label: On Change
change.description: An event triggered when the user has changed the value.

keydown.label: On Keydown
keydown.description: An event triggered when the user presses a key down. The user can cancel the keydown event by setting prevent to true.

blur.label: On Blur
blur.description: An event triggered when the user is no longer focused on the input.

update.label: On Update
update.description: An event triggered when the input is updated based on the Update On attribute.

bulma/textarea.label: Textarea
bulma/textarea.description: The multiline textarea and its variations

rows.label: Rows
rows.description: How many rows of text in this textarea.

autocomplete.label: Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: If & how the textarea should autocomplete values.

placeholder.label: Placeholder
placeholder.description: A placeholder to display in an empty textarea.

rounded.label: Rounded
rounded.description: If the textarea should have rounded corners.

disabled.label: Disabled
disabled.description: If the textarea should be disabled.

readonly.label: Read Only
readonly.description: If the textarea should be readonly,

fixedSize.label: Fixed Size
fixedSize.description: Whether the user can resize the textarea or not.

updateOn.label: Update On
updateOn.description: Which textarea event should trigger an update event.

input.label: On Input
input.description: An event triggered when the user changes the text textarea value.

change.label: On Change
change.description: An event triggered when the user has changed the value.

keydown.label: On Keydown
keydown.description: An event triggered when the user presses a key down. The user can cancel the keydown event by setting prevent to true.

blur.label: On Blur
blur.description: An event triggered when the user is no longer focused on the textarea.

update.label: On Update
update.description: An event triggered when the textarea is updated based on the Update On attribute.

bulma/select.label: Select
bulma/select.description: A dropdown input where you can select one or more options.
